description:
Prana's Brion Slim Pant II is the ultimate blend of high function and contemporary style. Made with ReZion™, the Earth-friendly evolution of their bestselling performance fabric, you can adventure confidently knowing there's over two decades of tried and trusted durability backing you up.

But this men's pant goes beyond the strength that comes standard in all ReZion™ styles. They reinforced both the mobility gusset and the back pocket with a double needle topstitch—for a style that's built tough and offers a modern trail-peak-to-city-street style.
name: Prana Brion Slim Pants II, 32" Inseam - Mens
